Key Match Events: Shanaka's resistance ends with a catch by Mitchell
Sri Lanka down to their last two wickets now
New Zealand drop a catch but continue to dominate
Hasaranga hits it to Kane Williamson at mid-on who takes a sharp catch
Sri Lanka down to their last four wickets now
